scripts.build: npm run build:cloudbeds && npm run build:mews && npm run build:guesty
scripts.deploy:cloudbeds: npm run build:cloudbeds && surge public klaviyo-hotel-cloudbeds.surge.sh
scripts.deploy:mews: npm run build:mews && surge public klaviyo-hotel-mews.surge.sh
scripts.deploy:guesty: npm run build:guesty && surge public klaviyo-hotel-guesty.surge.sh
scripts.dev:cloudbeds: nodemon --watch src/cloudbeds --watch src/shared --ext js --exec "npm run deploy:cloudbeds"
scripts.dev:mews: nodemon --watch src/mews --watch src/shared --ext js --exec "npm run deploy:mews"
scripts.dev:guesty: nodemon --watch src/guesty --watch src/shared --ext js --exec "npm run deploy:guesty"
